jobDescription: Looking for a personal assistant who’s ready to work on part time or full time, a long term position good benefits. As my personal assistant, your computer skills must be at the very least basic level. It matters not to me, the keyboard type you use. Your words per word minute should at the least be sufficient enough to get the job done. You shall be responsible for Managing busy schedule, help schedule appointments, booking flight tickets, Help handle some important document and email, Accurate inputting of data in timely manner, handling payroll. Basic experience needed also training will be given. FT work from home $500/week
